message: Bob, I'm excited you're interested in acquiring this unique product. Given its exceptional value and rarity, I'm offering it to you for $2200000. I believe it will be a valuable addition to your portfolio.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of a price that's a better fit for my budget. I'm willing to pay $700000 for the product, considering its value and rarity.
